message: Let's start with a fair deal. I'll take the majority, but you get a good chunk to start.
That's not a very fair deal Alice. How about we try something a bit more realistic?
Let's try a different approach. I'm willing to compromise, but we need to work together to get a deal before the money depreciates further.
This is getting us nowhere, Alice. I need you to meet me closer to the middle if we want to reach an agreement.
I'm coming closer to your offer, Bob.  We need to find a solution before the value of the money drops even more!
